name: edwards-webdev-monorepo
description: Edwards Web Development - Professional web development business website

scripts.build:ci: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:tournament && npm run copy:all
scripts.build:all:ci: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:tournament && npm run copy:all
scripts.copy:frontend: if exist frontend\dist\edwards-webdev-frontend (if exist backend\public rmdir /S /Q backend\public) & if not exist backend\public mkdir backend\public & if exist frontend\dist\edwards-webdev-frontend xcopy /E /I /Y frontend\dist\edwards-webdev-frontend\* backend\public\
scripts.copy:tournament: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$src='tournament-app/client/dist/retro-never-dies-client'; $dst='backend/public/tournaments'; if(!(Test-Path $src)){Write-Host 'Tournament dist not found:' $src; exit 0}; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path ($src + '/*') -Destination $dst -Recurse -Force; Write-Host 'Copied tournaments to' $dst"
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:frontend && npm run copy:tournament
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../tournament-app && npm run install:all
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/dist frontend/dist edwards-webdev-production.zip production-package.json DEPLOYMENT.md
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:tournament && npm run copy:all
scripts.serve:built: set NODE_ENV=production&& cd backend && npm start
scripts.zip: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$dest='dist-release'; $pkg=Join-Path $dest 'package'; if(Test-Path $dest){Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $dest}; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force $pkg | Out-Null; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force (Join-Path $pkg 'backend') | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force 'backend/dist' (Join-Path $pkg 'backend/dist'); Copy-Item -Recurse -Force 'backend/public' (Join-Path $pkg 'backend/public'); Copy-Item -Recurse -Force 'backend/data' (Join-Path $pkg 'backend/data'); Copy-Item -Force 'backend/.env' (Join-Path $pkg 'backend/.env'); Copy-Item -Force 'backend/package.json' (Join-Path $pkg 'backend/package.json'); Copy-Item -Force 'backend/package-lock.json' (Join-Path $pkg 'backend/package-lock.json'); Copy-Item -Force 'ecosystem.config.js' (Join-Path $pkg 'ecosystem.config.js'); Copy-Item -Recurse -Force 'scripts' (Join-Path $pkg 'scripts'); Copy-Item -Force 'DEPLOYMENT.md' (Join-Path $pkg 'DEPLOYMENT.md'); Compress-Archive -Path (Join-Path $pkg '*') -DestinationPath (Join-Path $dest 'release.zip') -Force"
scripts.release: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:tournament && npm run copy:all && npm run verify:release && npm run zip
scripts.verify:release: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$missing = @(); if (!(Test-Path 'backend/dist/server.js')) { $missing += 'backend/dist/server.js' }; if (!(Test-Path 'backend/public/index.html')) { $missing += 'backend/public/index.html' }; if (!(Test-Path 'backend/data')) { $missing += 'backend/data' }; if ($missing.Count -gt 0) { Write-Host 'ERROR: Missing required files:'; $missing | ForEach-Object { Write-Host '  -' $_ }; exit 1 } else { Write-Host 'All required files present.' }"

author: Edwards Web Development
